data.title: external speakers Grundig Majestic
data.text:
I was hoping to the find the cords for two Klang Strahler external speakers that I bought for my Grundig Majestic 190U. The console has a proprietary socket connection in the back that appears to have five connection points.

No luck though. Assuming I don't find the cord, can anyone suggest an alternative way to hook up the speakers to the console?

thanks,

jeff

To thank the Author because you find the post helpful or well done.

here are two photos: the back of the speaker and the back of the radio. I believe on the radio, the 5 ohm connection is where the speaker should be connected.

the user guide has no explanation for the panorama connection.

thanks for taking a look,

jeff

Attachments:

back of the console (152 KB)

back of the speaker (97 KB)

To thank the Author because you find the post helpful or well done.

This will be the connector that you are looking for.

Hopefully someone has the one for you.

Wolfgang

To thank the Author because you find the post helpful or well done.
